Package com.kneelawk.graphlib.api.graph

Interface GraphUniverse

public interface GraphUniverse
Represents one GraphWorld per ServerWorld. Provides access to each world's associated GraphWorld.

Note: GraphUniverses must be registered with the register() method in order to work properly.

    static interface 
    GraphUniverse.Builder
    A builder for GraphUniverses.

    • addNodeDecoder

      void addNodeDecoder(@NotNull @NotNull net.minecraft.util.Identifier typeId, @NotNull @NotNull BlockNodeDecoder decoder)
      Registers a BlockNodeDecoder for the given block node type id.

      The identifier under which the decoder is registered corresponds to the one returned by the associated block node's BlockNode.getTypeId().

      Parameters:
      typeId - the type id of the block node the decoder is being registered for.
      decoder - the block node decoder responsible for decoding the associated type of block node.

    • addNodeDecoders

      void addNodeDecoders(@NotNull @NotNull it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.Pair<net.minecraft.util.Identifier,? extends BlockNodeDecoder>... decoders)
      Registers a set of BlockNodeDecoder with associated block node type ids.

      The identifier under which a decoder is registered corresponds to the one returned by the associated block node's BlockNode.getTypeId().

      Parameters:
      decoders - the set of block node decoders to be registered.

    • addNodeDecoders

    • addNodeEntityDecoder

      void addNodeEntityDecoder(@NotNull @NotNull net.minecraft.util.Identifier typeId, @NotNull @NotNull NodeEntityDecoder decoder)
      Registers a NodeEntityDecoder for the given node entity type id.

      The identifier under which the decoder is registered corresponds to the one returned by the associated node entity's NodeEntity.getTypeId().

      Parameters:
      typeId - the type id of the node entity the decoder is being registered for.
      decoder - the node entity decoder responsible for decoding the associated type of node entity.

    • register

      void register()
      Registers this graph universe so that it can be found by its id.

      If a graph universe is not registered, it will not work.

    • getDefaultDebugColor

      int getDefaultDebugColor(@NotNull @NotNull net.minecraft.util.Identifier typeId)
      Gets the default debug color for use when encoding packets to clients.
      Parameters:
      typeId - the type id of the block node for which a color is being chosen.
      Returns:
      the ARGB default debug color.
